resources.string: A safer route to a more open Internet
When you use the Internet, your device needs to look up addresses in an Internet contact list. Sometimes your connection can give you the wrong address.
Vanir protects you from getting bad addresses that lead to dead ends (DNS manipulation) by encrypting your DNS connection.
Vanir needs to monitor network traffic to enable protection
Tap OK when you see the connection request to start. By default, your queries will be routed to Google Public DNS (Privacy Policy). You can choose another service in the app settings.
Vanir protects your DNS queries by routing them over a secure HTTPS connection. This reduces the chance that you will be sent to the wrong site, or have your browsing blocked or observed.
By default, your queries will be routed to Google Public DNS (Privacy Policy). You can also choose to use Cloudflare (Privacy Policy) or any other DNS-over-HTTPS service.
Vanir is an experimental security project by Cybertrigo.
Your connection is exposed to DNS attacks.
Your connection is protected from DNS attacks.
Your connection is currently protected by Android Private DNS, but an attacker could disable or undermine this protection.
Vanir has detected that the Android Private DNS setting is enabled. This means that your DNS queries are already protected, so there\'s no need to enable Vanir.
Just a moment. Vanir is establishing a server connection.
Your device is offline. Vanir is waiting for a network connection.
Vanir has detected another VPN on your device. If you enable Vanir, that VPN will be disabled. Vanir is not as secure as a trusted VPN.
Warning: Queries are failing. You may want to choose a different server and restart Vanir.
Custom server must be a valid https:// URL
DNS queries from any selected apps will not go through Vanir. If an app appears to be incompatible with Vanir, you can add it here.
Mark apps to exclude from Vanir
This functionality is not available on your version of Android.
Help us to improve Vanir! Vanir is an early-stage product and we need your help to make it better. Tell us what\'s working, and what\'s not. Thanks!
This information will be sent to the Vanir team. Please do not include any personal information in your feedback.
Tap to change DNS protection setting
This notification appears while DNS protection is active.
Shown when Vanir has encountered a problem.
